subject: weird experience . . .
author: judy_in_hollywood
full_text: Hi All,  I was listening, with my ear-cups type headphones that were plugged into the RS Hack 469, for maybe 30 mins., not tapping (ran out of tape), and in the forground could hear voice/words every now and then (EVP's?), but . . . . in the background -throughout!- I could hear (but barely make out) a person -male- talking like from an interview! I had asked if anyone was here with a message, or if Mike & Lisa was there, or if John Lennon would like to say something (was it him??), then listened!  Has any of you experienced this???  =Judy=
